name: Werewolves and Cheese Wheels and Vampires
name_original: Werewolves and Cheese Wheels and Vampires
description:
Third game ever made. Co-created with Thomas Tran at the Winter 2017 Game Jam held by the UC Davis Game Development and Arts Club. Art by Joshua Zhang. Music by Kristen Kirk.

Goal:

  • Escape the 2 sections of Moonbase alpha
  • Avoid or fight enemy werewolves and vampires

Controls:

  • A and D keys or left and right arrow keys to move
  • W or up arrow key to stab
  • Space bar to jump
  • Stand on teleporters for a few seconds to activate them
